name: Verbal Voice Technologies, Inc
description: Developer virtual care Artificial intelligence (AI) platform designed to help healthcare payers and providers to automate admin work, streamline quality assurance and level up care team performance. The company's platform analyzes audio from live calls and draws on organizational protocols to automate key administrative tasks and give care healthcare professionals real-time guidance on how best to respond and shortens the time to onboarding proficiency by providing real-time coaching during customer interactions, enabling medical professionals to focus on handling care management and drug safety.
one_liner: Developer virtual care Artificial intelligence (AI) platform designed to help healthcare payers and providers to automate admin work, streamline quality assurance and level up care team performance. The company's platform analyzes audio from live calls and draws on organizational protocols to automate key administrative tasks and give care healthcare professionals real-time guidance on how best to respond and shortens the time to onboarding proficiency by providing real-time coaching during customer interactions, enabling medical professionals to focus on handling care management and drug safety.
